text: Hey is this channel dead? can we still dump ideas here when they come up? :wink:
Hey John. Nope this channel is still alive. Feel free to drop ideas in here, but I’d also recommend checking <http://ideas.HubSpot.com|ideas.HubSpot.com> as well.

Awesome! so we'll dump something in ideas too, and I know our developers have talked with a number of HubSpot friends about this. but the idea of collaborative editing inside the platform is huge. We're getting it for blog now it looks like. Working in the same stylesheet would be awesome
Is that happeneing in the blog right now?
I think it's the Composer tool
Great idea, John. We don’t have any immediate plans for collaborative editing in Design Manager/stylesheets, but it’s something we’ll look at as we plan future updates.
That said, keep these ideas coming as they are helpful as we consider where the design and editing experiences are headed.
We do a lot of building inside HubSpot, so when I have 3 guys on building templates only one can be in the CSS at a time. we have work arounds, but it would be helpful :wink:
